data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Tim's son Barry has the biggest imagination of any kid I know. Ever ____ he ____ been ____, ____ has ____ the ____ things. He ____ asks ____ about ____ creatures ____ crazy ____ events. I think he's going to be a great fiction writer one day.
data.partBlankContent: Tim's son Barry has the biggest imagination of any kid I know. Ever si___ he h__ been tal____, h_ has sa__ the wil____ things. He alw___ asks ques_____ about myth____ creatures o_ crazy fut___ events. I think he's going to be a great fiction writer one day.
data.fullContent: Tim's son Barry has the biggest imagination of any kid I know. Ever since he has been talking, he has said the wildest things. He always asks questions about mythical creatures or crazy future events. I think he's going to be a great fiction writer one day.
data.answer: 蒂姆的儿子巴里是我认识的孩子中想象力最大的。自从他说话以来，他说了些最荒唐的话。他总是问一些关于神秘生物或疯狂的未来事件的问题。我认为有一天他会成为一个伟大的小说家。
